refnamediv.refpurpose: Calculates a factor to raise/lower a frequency by a given amount of cents.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Calculates a factor to raise/lower a frequency by a given amount of cents.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.para: This function works at a-rate, i-rate, and k-rate.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: x -- a value expressed in cents.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: The value returned by the cent function is a factor. You can multiply a frequency by this factor to raise/lower it by the given amount of cents.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the cent opcode. It uses the file cent.csd.
Example of the cent opcode.
See the sections Real-time Audio and Command Line Flags for more information on using command line flags.
Its output should include lines like:
instr 1: iroot = 440.000
instr 2: iroot = 440.000 instr 2: ifactor = 1.189 instr 2: inew = 523.251
instr 2: iroot = 440.000 instr 2: ifactor = 2.000 instr 2: inew = 880.000
